summary: The BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces substantial new backend authorization/data APIs and multiple frontend UI features (tabs, daily orders workflow, karigar mapping upload/parsing, exporting), none of which were requested in the provided BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend access control integration and permission-gated APIs for user profiles, storing daily orders, assigning karigars, and reading orders/assignments.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided, yet new authorization/stateful backend behaviors were implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend app shell with sidebar navigation and three tabs (Order List, Daily Order Upload, Karigar Mapping) and updated header/footer branding.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest listed no requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Daily orders page workflow including date selection, upload/parse, assignment UI, filtering, factory grouping, swipe support, and export controls.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest listed no requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Karigar mapping upload tab and parsing of mapping from Excel/PDF with sheet priority and column detection.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest listed no requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: HTML-based export generators for factory-wide and per-karigar downloads (despite file names suggesting PDF).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest listed no requirements.
